# How to create Cardano native tokens?

Unlike Ethereum-based tokens created using smart contracts, Cardano native tokens run on the same blockchain layer as the ada cryptocurrency. Cardano’s architecture makes native tokens more secure and reduces the fees associated with transactions. Go to [developers.cardano.org](https://developers.cardano.org/docs/native-tokens/) to find out how to create tokens on Cardano.
